mapper.select: select a.contents as contents, c.name as name, a.workspace_no as workspaceNo, b.no from noti a, noti_user b, workspace c where a.no = b.noti_no and c.no = a.workspace_no and b.send_to = #{sendTo } and (a.type = "invite" || a.type = "workspace") order by b.no desc

select a.contents as contents, c.name as name, a.workspace_no as workspaceNo, b.no from noti a, noti_user b, workspace c where a.no = b.noti_no and c.no = a.workspace_no and b.send_to = #{sendTo } and (a.type = "channel" || a.type = "doc" || a.type = "chatroom") order by b.no desc
